post.body: Red Sox programming?? LMAO As for me, let MLB Net find some old '60s-era Senators clips. THAT'LL keep me watching. Really.
And didn't you just love the LIVE spots in the booth?? Uncomplicated television. Yes, that's HOW it was done in those days!!!
Unfortunately, the Twitter generation has NO clue what kinescopes are/were. (But I do...lol) How many cameras did they use again??
Find my MLBlog "Nasty Nats Live Here (and Everywhere)" when you get a chance.
I don't know. i guess I'm waiting for the launch of the MLB Network @ 6 Eastern. Satisfied??
